How many people are affected by 3-M syndrome ?,3-M syndrome is a rare disorder. About 50 individuals with this disorder have been identified worldwide.,GHR,3-M syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to 3-M syndrome ?,"Mutations in the CUL7 gene cause 3-M syndrome. The CUL7 gene provides instructions for making a protein called cullin-7. This protein plays a role in the cell machinery that breaks down (degrades) unwanted proteins, called
